ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: My Lord, bestow on me a right-acting child!'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: (And he prayed:) "O Lord, grant me a righteous son."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Lord, grant me a righteous son.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Abraham prayed, "Lord, grant me a righteous son".
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “My Lord! Give me a meritorious child.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: My Lord! Grant me (offspring) from the righteous."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: My Lord! grant me of the doers of good deeds.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: My Lord, give me one of the righteous.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: My Lord! Vouchsafe me of the righteous.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Lord, grant me a righteous son."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: My Lord! Bestow on me a son who will be of the righteous.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: ‘My Lord! Give me [an heir], one of the righteous.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: O my Lord! Grant me a righteous (son)!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: My Lord! Grant me (offspring) from the righteous."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: My Lord, grant me a righteous (son)'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: “My Lord, give me one of the righteous.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: My Lord, grant me [a child] from among the righteous."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [37:100] My Lord! Grant me, a child, of the righteous’.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: Then he said: (My Lord! Vouchsafe me of the righteous) a son who is among the messengers.
